Posts.Content: Reporting for duty Dreamthief Sir, yes Sir! Thanks awfully for the link, very much appreciated and I'm very, very happy to be here amongst friends. If anyone would like a special bag made to order in particular colours or a specific size, I'm sure I can whizz something up. Today is a pants tough day, I woke up at 4am in a bit of a cold sweat. Yesterday's news is obviously on my mind. I put a brave face on it but underneath I'm a wobbly jelly.Â  Rachel :)
